document_data.mainbody: Tanis Keltronn was a human male and the head of the Keltronn mercantile family in Eshpurta, which gave him a seat on the Shield Council as of early 1370 DR, the Year of the Tankard. He was a distant cousin of the powerful Argrim family of Athkatla, who made his reputation in the food and wine markets through ruthless negotiation.
